Langoni intends to use the loan of 30,000 KES to purchase sugar, wheat flour and cooking fat.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, wheat flour and cooking fat.

loans.name: Adwowa

texts.en: Adwowa operates a grocery store at Waakrom near Cape Coast. She has done this for four years. The items in her grocery store are: canned fish, canned tomatoes, milo, different kinds of drinks, biscuits, toffees, milk, soap, etc. She is married to a farmer and has two children.  Adwowa uses her income to support her husband in paying their children’s school fees.  She will use her loan to purchase a variety of groceries to sell. With her profits, Adwowa  plans to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of groceries to sell

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua is married to a farmer and has six children.  Ekua produces kenkey to sell. In front of her are the leaves she uses in her kenkey production. She has been doing this for six years. She uses her income to support her husband and to feed and clothe her children and pay for their school fees. Ekua will use her loan to purchase bags of maize, leaves, and firewood to produce her kenkey to sell. With her profits, she will expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase bags of maize, leaves, and firewood to produce her kenkey to sell

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en:
Kennedy is 23 years old.  He is married and has three children, all of whom attend school.  He rents a house that has electricity but not running water.  His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Kennedy has been selling fish to his neighbors and passersby.  The major challenge he faces in his business is seasonality.  He dreams of creating job opportunities and hiring employees to run his business.

With the loan of 25,000 KES, he wants to purchase public address system equipment that he will rent out for a fee.  He decided to join Yehu in order to gain access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase public address system equipment to rent out for a fee.

loans.name: Adwowa

texts.en: Adwowa is a food vendor. She cooks rice and fish stew to sell at Waakrom near Cape Coast.  Adwowa is married and has five children. Her husband is a mason.  She has been in this business for three years now.  She uses her income to support her husband in feeding their children. Adwowa will use her loan to purchase bags of rice and fish to cook and sell.  With her profit, Adwowa plans to build a better stall for the selling of her food.

loans.use: To purchase bags of rice and fish to cook and sell

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba extracts palm kennel oil to sell at Waakrom near Gyakye. Aba is a single parent and has six children. As a single parent, she uses her income to feed and clothe her children.  Aba will use her loan to purchase more palm kennel for extracting oil to sell. With her profit, she wishes to buy a machine for her business.

loans.use: To purchase more palm kennel for extracting oil to sell

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is a baker.  She bakes bread to sell, which she has been doing for two years now. She is married with six children. Ama uses her income to support her husband in the general upkeep of their home.  Ama will use her loan to purchase flour, sugar, and cooking oil for her bakery. With her profits, she will buy a modern oven to make her work easier.

loans.use: To purchase flour, sugar, and cooking oil for her bakery

loans.name: Mariela De La Concepcion

texts.es: Mariela tiene 34 años de edad, su actividad económica es abarrotería, hace más de 15 años, ella dio inicio a este negocio con muy pocos productos por lo que anteriormente su local era muy pequeño, y solamente tenía 2 canastas con los siguientes productos como frutas y cosméticos, poco a poco es que ha ido aumentando su negocio por lo que sus 2 hijos son los motivos suficientes por el cual ella tiene que seguir trabajando y luchando para seguir adelante. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo y así comprar los productos como: caramelos, chocolates, meneítos, chicharrones, yucas, pan, arroz, azúcar, pollos, embutidos, crema  entre otros. El deseo de Mariela es mejorar su negocio y obtener mejores ingresos económicos para la mantención de su familia.
texts.en:
Mariela is 34 years old and her economic activity is a grocery store she’s had for more than 15 years.  She started the business with very few products so her store was very small; she only had two baskets with products like fruit and cosmetics.  Gradually she’s been increasing business; her two children are motivation enough to continue working and striving to continue forward.

The financing she’s asking for is for working capital to buy such products as: candy, chocolates, cheese puffs, fried pork rinds, manioc, bread, rice, chickens, cured meats and cream, among others.  Mariela’s wish is to improve her business to obtain income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Niger Armando

texts.es: Don Niger de 48 años de edad,se dedica al comercio de mariscos con mas de quince años en las ventas. Siendo este su principal fuente de ingreso. Dentro de sus dificultades esta el no contar con un apoyo de esposa sin embargo no le ha sido de impedimento para quedarse estancado y no poder salir adelante. Gracias a los financiamientos otorgados por la institucion ha venido diversificando el inventario de su negocio la cual es traida desde Bluefields e incrementando sus ventas y ganancias. Su proyecto con este su quinto ciclo de credito es rein-vertirlo a su negocio comprando asi chacalines, ostiones, camarones, langosta,pescados, concha, punches, entre otros productos. Debido a la demanda que ha observado en estos ultimos meses planea aumentar su inventario y abastecer esa oferta de trabajo para incrementar sus ingresos mensuales. Su deseo en un futuro es tener sus propias materia de trabajo en Bluefields y ahorrarse los traslados de mercaderia.
texts.en:
Don Niger, 48, devotes himself to selling seafood, with more than 15 years in sales, this being his primary source of income. Among his difficulties is that of not having support from a wife; however this has not been such an impediment as to keep him from avoiding stagnation and making progress. Thanks to the financing given by the institution he has been diversifying his business's inventory which he brings from Bluefields, and increasing his sales and earnings. 

His plans for this loan cycle, which is his fifth, is to reinvest in his business, buying among other products: small Nicaraguan shrimp, oysters, shrimp, lobster, fish, conchs, and sea crabs. Owing to the demand he has seen in recent months he plans to increase his sales inventory and stock up in order to increase his monthly earnings. His hope for the future is to have his own work materials in Bluefields and save on transportation costs for his merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seafood for his business.

loans.name: Elena Estefana

texts.es:
La señora Elena Estefana esta soltera, tiene 38 años de edad,  se dedica al comercio, inicio este negocio por el apoyo de su señor padre y hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería, cortes, delantales, blusas, fajas, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en: Elena Estefana is single; she’s 38 years old and a merchant.  She started the business with support from her father and to date has 20 years’ experience.  She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise: bolts of fabric, aprons, blouses, sashes, etc.  She hopes in future to have a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy yarn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee plants and organic manure.

loans.name: Ilsen Maria

texts.es: Ilsen de 29 años esta emprendedora inicio su negocio hace 9 años atrás vendiendo muy pocos productos como ropa y cosméticos más tarde, como le genero buenos ingreso decidió invertir una parte de las ganancias en mercadería variada  Poco a poco con esfuerzo pudo surtir su negocio. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche.  Aunque la venta de contado le genera mejores ganancias ella también le gusta vender de manera ambulante así le da oportunidad de conocer a mas clientes. Ella quiere comprar con el préstamo ropa, cosméticos, calzado y toallas para venderla a sus vecinos y así tener un ingreso adicional. En el futuro quiere tener su negocio más estable y seguro.
texts.en:
Ilsen, 29, is an entrepreneur who started her business 9 years ago selling very few products like clothes and cosmetics.  Later on since it generated good income she decided to invest part of the profits in varied merchandise.  Little by little she was able to stock her business.  She currently works from 7am until 9pm.  

Although cash sales generate better profits, she also likes to sell from place to place because she gets to meet more customers that way.  She wants to use the loan to buy clothes, cosmetics, shoes and towels to sell to her neighbors and earn extra income.  In the future she’d like to have a more stable, secure business.

loans.use: to buy clothes, cosmetics, shoes and towels.

loans.name: Olga Marina

texts.es:
La señora Olga Marina es casada, tiene 36 años de edad, cursó el segundo año de educación media, tiene   4 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a confeccionan tejidos, gabachas, delantales, inicio este negocio por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de una maquina, con mejor condición industrial y así mejorar su trabajo y agilizar su encargos, espera en el futuro tener un  negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Olga Marina’s married.  She’s 36 years old and finished second year of secondary school.  She has four children attending school.  She works weaving fabric, aprons, ‘gabachas’ [wrap-around style aprons].  She started on her own initiative and to date has 6 years’ experience.

She’s asking for a loan to buy a machine with industrial capacity to improve her work and fill her orders more easily.  She hopes in future to have a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy a machine.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Del Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DEL CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Magdalena ella es viuda y tiene 64 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de productos secos como trigo, cebada y maíz, la socia vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar trigo, cebada y maíz. 
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de artesanía, negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de venta de pasto y negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Virgen Del Rosario Del Cusco” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

The member is Margarita, 64.  She has five children.  She works in her dry goods, like wheat, barley and corn, business.  She sells from place to place from 6am until 5pm.  She is able to support her children by means of this business.  Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell her dry goods.  

She’s asking for the loan to buy wheat, barley and corn.

The other members are in crafts, sell traditional fabric, sell grass and run grocery stores.

The members thanks those who form part of this dream through his means and commits to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy wheat, barley and corn.

loans.name: Rosa Yovana

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora, es madre de 4 hijos a los cuales cría sola y los ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo ya que por razones ajenas el padre de sus hijos la abandono y desde ese momento se convirtió en padre y madre para sus hijos. Su vivienda se encuentra en el distrito de Parcona, el cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y también porque se desarrolla la agricultura y la ganadería. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Rosas le gusta salir a pasear y si es que se puede viajar; asimismo le gusta preparar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”; ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Enfermería.

Día a día Rosa trabaja con mucho entusiasmo en su negocio de confección de alfombras, telares, entre otros de manera artesanal, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 7 horas al día y puede atender hasta 2 clientes diariamente, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy detallista y sobre todo tiene mucha creatividad para la confección de sus productos.

Rosa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más material para la confección de sus productos como lana, palos de tejer, tocuyo, entre otros, así ella podrá tener los materiales necesarios para realizar su trabajo y mejorar sus ingresos; lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una mejor calidad de Vida”.
texts.en:
Rosa’s a very hardworking woman and the mother of four children she’s raising alone; she’s moved them ahead with much effort because for reasons beyond her control the father of her children abandoned them and since then she became both father and mother to her children.

Her dwelling is located in Parcona District which is noted for having a hot climate and because farming and livestock raising take place there.  When she has any free time available, Rosa likes to go out for excursions and, if possible, to travel.  She also enjoys preparing one of her favorite dishes which is the very delicious “Arroz con Pollo” [Chicken with Rice].  She only went to secondary school but would have liked to have studied Nursing.

Day to day Rosa works with much enthusiasm in her business manufacturing rugs and looms, among other in an artisanal way.  She spends about 7 hours daily at work and can tend to 2 customers daily.  She believes that she does well in her business because she’s very detail oriented and very creative in making her products.

Rosa is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given her she will be able to buy more supplies for her manufacturing like wool, knitting needles and rough cotton cloth, among others to have materials available to do her work and improve her income which will allow her to continue striving every day to reach her greatest dream: to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy weaving supplies.

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.ru: Мухаммад проживает в районе Яван. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его братья находятся на заработках за рубежом. Сам Мухаммад занимается скотоводством. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупного рогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Muhammad is residing in the Yavan region. He is 34 years old. He is married with five children.  His brothers are working abroad. Muhammad has been involved in cattle husbandry for 2 years. He earns money through breeding cattle. He is taking out a loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Pe'a Lealai

texts.en: Pe'a Lealai is a 59-year-old woman who is married with five children. She runs a sewing business in her community. She has more than 10 years of experience with this business. Pe'a Lealai has requested a loan to buy a new sewing machine, threads, etc. She plans to use her profits to pay for her grandchildren's school fees and to save for future plans for the business. She joined SPBD in 2006 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, threads, etc

loans.name: Miguela

texts.es:
Miguela tiene 40 años, vive con Edgar, con quien tiene 7 hijos cuyas edades oscilan entre los 23 y 3 años de edad. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Huasahuasi – Tarma.

Desde niña se dedicó a la agricultura, que es la principal actividad económica de su distrito. Lleva más de 20 años en la siembra de arvejas, habas, maíz y papa. Le gusta su trabajo porque sus ganancias dependen de su esfuerzo propio; además de recibir el apoyo de su esposo Edgar, quien la mayor parte de los días está en el campo labrando la tierra. También tiene vacas y toros, que enseba y revende a un buen precio. “La venta de los productos es rentable en las campañas grandes, por ejemplo ahora (mayo) inicia la campaña de arvejas”, comenta.
Y según menciona le va muy bien porque las arvejas y papas siempre se venden. Pero hay meses donde el precio baja, perjudicándola. Para el futuro desea juntar dinero y conseguir más animales, ya que también es rentable la crianza de ganado.

Éste sería su crédito número 7 que recibe de MFP. Como en oportunidades anteriores, menciona que será puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Huanchán” y le gusta el trabajo que realizan como grupo.
Con el dinero obtenido comprará dos bolsas de semillas de arvejas, cuyo precio es de 550 soles cada una. Lo restante será para la compra de fertilizantes.
texts.en:
Miguela, 40, lives with Edgar with whom she has 7 children whose ages oscillate between 23 and 3 years.  They live in their own house located in Huasahuasi-Tarma District.

Since she was a little girl she’s been working in agriculture which is her district’s main economic activity.  She’s been growing peas, lima beans, corn and potatoes for 20 years.  She likes her work because the profits depend on her own efforts; she also gets help from her husband, Edgar, who spends most of his time in the fields working the soil.  She also has cows and bulls that she fattens up and resells at a good price.  “Selling products is profitable, especially during the big seasons, for example now (May) the lima bean season starts,” she comments.

As she also mentions, she does very well because peas and potatoes always sell.  But there are months when prices drop harming her.  For the future, she’d like to save up money and buy more animals because raising cattle is also profitable.

This would be the 7th loan she’s received from MFP.  Like on previous occasions, she mentions that she will be punctual with her monthly installment payments.  She belongs to the “Unión Huanchán” communal bank and she likes the work they do as a group.

She will use the money obtained to buy two sacks of pea seeds which cost 550 soles each; she will use the rest to buy fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Xiomara Antonia

texts.es:
La  señora xiomara antonia  vive en la ciudad de Managua 
Trabaja por cuenta propia  tiene 16 años de administrar su negocio  con el primer préstamo en ceprodel lo invirtió en  negocio y así incrementar su inventario 
Doña xiomara   acudió a nuestras oficina para hacer la solicitud de un crédito  por que quiere mejorar el techo de su vivienda porque considera  que es necesario el cambio  de techo de su vivienda.
La inversión que la  señora  va hacer es la compra de zinc y  perlines  para mejorar el techo de la vivienda ya que  con la venida del invierno lo considera necesario
La señora  se siente agradecida con ceprodel por que el tiempo que tiene de trabajar con créditos de ceprodel ha recibido buenas atenciones  y ha podido mejorar su condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Xiomara Antonia lives in the city of Managua.  She works for herself and has been running her own business for 16 years.  She used her first Ceprodel loan to invest in her business and increase her inventory.

Xiomara called on our offices to make a loan request because she wants to repair the roof on her house because she believes it’s necessary to replace the roof.  She wants to buy metal sheeting and purlines to improve the roof because with winter approaching she believes it’s necessary.

She is grateful to Ceprodel because in all the time she’s been working with Ceprodel loans she’s received good service and has been able to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting and purlines.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Mercedes una mujer con metas a futuro, esforzada y trabajadora, expresa sentirse feliz por la bendicion de tener su negocio de comida, siendo este su maxima fuente de ingreso para ella y los suyos. Su esposo mes a mes recibe una pension de parte del Estado por ser el ya jubilado pero debido a las alzas de precios tanto en canasta basica, educacion, servicios basicos y otros no ha podido cubrir totalmente sus necesidades. Hace mas de cuatro años ya en las ventas de fritanga; invirtiendole a su negocio es como ha podido alcanzar planes que se ha propuesto y con el auxilio economico que le ha dado Afodenic y kiva a traves de finaciamientos. Con creditos anteriores realizo un baño ahora con este nuevo prestamo pretende invertirlo en la construccion de un cuarto comprando de esta manera los siguientes materiales de construccion: bloques, cemento, arena, tablas, alambre de amarre, piedrin, perlines, laminas de zinc, golosos, soldaduras entre otros obteniendo con esta infraestructura poder ofrecerles a su familia privacidad, mayores comodidades y mejores niveles de vida.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a woman with future goals.  She’s determined and hardworking.  She says that she feels happy for the blessing of having her food business since this is her main source of income for herself and her loved ones.  

Her husband is retired and receives a monthly stipend from the State but because the cost of basic staples, education, basic utilities and others continues to rise, he is unable to completely cover expenses.  

Since about four years ago she started selling fast food and by investing in her business she’s been able to reach the goals she’s set out for herself with the economic help Afodenic and Kiva have provided through their loans.

She used previous loans to build a bathroom and will use this new loan to build a room.  She will buy the necessary materials and supplies like concrete blocks, cement, sand, lumber, wire, gravel, purlines, metal sheeting, screws and solder, among others thus obtaining the infrastructure to give her family privacy, more comfort and a better standard of living.

loans.use: to add a room to her house.

loans.name: Failautusi Eni

texts.en: Failautusi Eni is 42 years old and married with one child. She runs a small business selling Samoan food such as oka (raw fish with coconut cream) and boiled bananas in her community. She has been doing this for four years. Failautusi Eni has requested a loan to buy new items to sell within the business. She will also spend part of her loan on tin roofing for her house renovation. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. Failautusi Eni will use her profit for home improvement.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food stall and a tin roof for her house

loans.name: Rafis

texts.ru: Rafisu 28 let, on ne jenat. On rabotaet na svoem traktore na zemelnix uchastkax. Traktor na kotorom on rabotaet uje stariy I sozdaet mnogo problem, v budushem kogda dela u nego poydut xorosho on planiruet kupit noviy no segodna emu nujni dengi dla togo chtobi kupit kosilku dla travi. On obratilsa za summoy v 1000 AZN. Rafis sam soderjivaet svoix roditeley, on ochen otvetstvenniy molodoy chelovek.
texts.en: Rafis is 28 years old, he is single. He works plots of land using his tractor.  The tractor he uses is old and has many problems.  In the future, when he is better off, he is planning to buy a new one, but today he needs money to purchase a mower for grass.  He is requesting a sum of 1,000 AZN. Rafis is supporting his parents by himself and is a very responsible young man.

loans.use: to buy a mower for grass.

loans.name: Talalelei

texts.en: Talalelei is a 49-year-old woman who is married with three children. She runs a sewing business in her community. She has more than 10 years of experience in this business. Talalelei has requested a loan to buy a new sewing machine and more materials. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and pay for her children's school fees. She joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and materials

loans.name: Sayavush

texts.ru: Sayavush zanat torgovley. Sfera ego biznesa eto prodaja mujskoy odejdi, takie kak bruki, rubashki, tufli I td. On v etom biznese uje 7 let, Sayavush jenat, u nego troe detey. Ego biznes eto edinstvenniy doxod dla semyi I poetomu on xochet rasshirit delo. U nego deti shkolnogo vozrasta i on staraetsa radi ix budushego s sovestyu. Sayavush prosit 1500 AZN dla togo 4tobi kupit novie tovari dla prodaji.
texts.en:
Sayavush is engaged in trade. The area of his business is selling men's clothing, like pants, shirts, shoes and so on. He has been in this business for 7 years. 

Sayavush is married, and has three children. His business is the sole income of the family and therefore he would like to expand it. He has children of school age and he tries to works with a conscience the sake of their future. Sayavush requests 1500 AZN in order to purchase new products to sell.

loans.use: to purchase new men's clothing to sell

loans.name: Suli Wuilma

texts.es:
Suli  es una mujer que tiene 61 años de edad, de estado civil casada, sin ningún  hijo a su cargo, vive  en casa propia con su cónyuge. Se menciona que  La calidad de vida en la comunidad es de subsistencia, la mayoría de moradores  son trabajadores independientes  que se dedican al comercio y crianza de animales menores y algunos de ellos adicionalmente dedicados a la agricultura. Suli vive en  el distrito de Salas, departamento de Lambayeque, así mismo cuentan con  todos los  servicios  básicos;  Así mismo todas las familias que radican ahí viven bajo estas condiciones.
 La actividad comercial a la que se dedica Suli es la venta de Frutas (naranjas, guanábanas, pepinos, papayas, manzanas, otros) así también se dedica a la venta de tubérculos (papas, camotes) esto lo realiza en el mercado central de esta zona, cabe destacar que en esta actividad Mercedes cuenta con 10 años de experiencia, lo que le ha permitido mantener su clientela ya establecida en este negocio; Así mismo su cónyuge  le apoyan en esta actividad.
Actualmente Suli se ha propuesto ampliar su capital de trabajo, esto debido a que es una actividad muy rentable en la zona; es por estas circunstancias  que esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de S/ 2000 nuevos soles el cual estará destinado a la  compra de frutas y tubérculos para poder surtir su negocio, lo cual en el tiempo le va permitir ir mejorando su nivel de vida de su familia
texts.en:
Suli’s a 61 year old, married woman with no children in her care.  She lives with her spouse in her own house.  It’s mentioned that the living conditions in the community are at the subsistence level.   Most of the residents are independent workers who are in commerce and animal husbandry; some of them also work in agriculture.  Suli lives in Salas District in Lambayeque Department.  They have all basic utilities and all the families living there do so under these conditions.

Suli’s commercial activity is selling fruit (oranges, soursops, cucumbers, papaya, apples and others) and also tubers (potatoes, sweet potatoes) in the local central market.  It should be noted that Mercedes has 10 years’ experience which has allowed her to retain her business’ regular clientele.  Her husband helps her with this activity.
 
Suli has proposed to increase her working capital because this is a very profitable activity in the zone which is why she’s asking Edpyme Alternativa for a new loan in the amount of 2000 new soles to buy fruit and tubers to stock her business which in time will allow her to gradually improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fruit and tubers to stock her business.

loans.name: Mirgul

texts.ru:
Миргул  27 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей. Миргул на протяжении 6 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 10 овец Благодаря упорному труду Миргул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  5 дойных коров и 50 овец, продажа молока и молочных продуктов составляет 15,000 сом в месяц.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Миргул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои.  Доходы от кредита Миргул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Mirgul is 27 years old, married, and has two children. Mirgul has been engaged in animal husbandry for a period of 6 years, after having started this business with 10 sheep. Thanks to persistent work, Mirgul currently has 5 dairy cows and 50 sheep at her farm, and the sale of milk and dairy products is 15,000 som (KGS) per month. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Mirgul turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 135,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of dairy cows, which will allow her to increase the milk production. Mirgul plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows

loans.name: Kereta

texts.en:
Kereta is a 56-year-old married woman with children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than five years. Kereta has requested a loan to buy new farm supplies and more taro crops.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Kereta hopes to improve her business and save for her house renovation.

loans.use: to buy seeds, taro crops, and equipment

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a 23-year-old woman who is married with no children. She has a small bingo business. She has more than three years experience in this business. Agnes needs a loan to buy a new bingo machine. She will use her profits to make improvements to her bingo prizes and for renovation of her home. Agnes joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a bingo machine

loans.name: Qiyomidin

texts.ru: Киёмидин проживает в районе Яван. Ему 31 год. У него четверо детей. Его жена занимается растениеводством. Сам Киёмидин закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Он берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en:
Qiyomidin lives in the region Yavan. He is 31 years old. He has four children. His wife is engaged in crop production. 

Qiyomidin himself buys cattle for reselling in the future. He has been engaged in this type of activity for two years. He takes a loan for the purchase of calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy yarn.

loans.name: Estrellas Azules Group

texts.es:
ESTRELLAS AZULES ES UN GRUPO SOLIDARIO DE CREDITUYO, LLEVAN ESES NOMBRE YA QUE EL DIA EN QUE FORMARON EL GRUPO ESTABAN VIENDO EL CIELO, Y SE LES OCURRIO PONER EL NOMBRE YA QUE ELLAS SE CONCIDERAN UNAS ESTRELLAS Y SU LIMITE ES EL CIELO.
ERENDIDA ES UNA DE LAS INTEGRTANTES DEL GRUPO,VIVE EN UNION LIBRE CON SU PAREJA AUN NO TIENE HIJOS.
ELLA SE DEDICA ALA VENTA DE ROPA EN LOS MERCADOS RODANTES DE LA CIUDAD DESDE HACE MAS DE 7 AÑOS. ELLA UTILIZARA SU CREDITO PARA SURTIR ROPA, PARA LA TEMPORADA DE VERANO.

EN UN FUTURO, ERENDIDA PIENSA TENER EL PUESTO MAS GRANDE DEL MERCADO Y CON MAYOR SURTIDO PARA TENER MAS GANACIAS Y PODERSE CASAR Y TENER HIJOS.
texts.en:
Estrellas Azules [Blue Stars] is a solidarity group at Credituyo. They chose this name because the day they started the group they were looking at the sky and they decided to use the name because they think of themselves as stars and the sky is their limit.

Erendida is one of the members of the group, she is in a common law marriage with her partner and she doesn't have any children yet. She has worked selling clothes at the street markets in the city for more than 7 years. She will use her loan to stock up on clothes for the summer season.

In the future Erendida plans to have the biggest stall in the market with the best stock so she can make a better profit and then be able to get married and have children.

loans.use: to stock up on seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Nurzat

texts.ru:
Нурзат 30 лет, замужем, воспитывает 3 детей. Нурзат работает воспитателем в детском саду и в качестве дополнительного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 2007 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 50,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Нурзат на сегодняшний  день имеется  16 овец, 2 коровы с телятами и 3 кобылы.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нурзат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп породистых овец.  Доходы от кредита Нурзат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Nurzat is 30 years old, married and is bringing up 3 children. Nurzat is working as a teacher in a daycare center and, as an additional source of income for her family, has been involved in raising livestock since 2007, having started this business with the initial investment of 50,000 som (KGS). Presently Nurzat's farm has 16 sheep, 2 cows with calves and 3 horses.

To further develop her business, Nurzat has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy thoroughbred sheep. She plans to invest profits from this loan into further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Khazhu

texts.ru:
Хажу 58 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Хажу на протяжении 25 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 6,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Хажу в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  2 дойные коровы, 2 теленка, 1 лошадь, а также 1,0 га поливной земли, где она выращивает болгарский перец.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Хажу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 3 нетелей.  Доходы от кредита Хажу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Khazhu is 58 years old, married, and has four children. Khazhu has been engaged in animal husbandry for a period of 25 years, after having started this business with a sum of 6,000 som (KGS). Thanks to persistent work, Khazhu currently has 2 dairy cows, 2 calves and 1 horse at her farm, and further 1.0 hectares of irrigated land, where she grows Bulgarian peppers. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Khazhu turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of three heifers. Khazhu plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of farm animals.

loans.use: to purchase heifers

loans.name: Faaaoao

texts.en: Faaaoao is a 40-year-old married woman with one kid. She runs a small business selling coffee and snacks and has been doing this for more than three years. Faaaoao has requested a loan to buy new items and more supplies to sell. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Faaaoao will make improvement within her business.

loans.use: to buy more supplies such as coffee, an electric kettle, sugar, and foam cups

loans.name: Chachykan

texts.ru:
Чачыкан 47 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Чачыкан на протяжении 20 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес практически с нуля. Благодаря упорному труду Чачыкан в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  2 дойные коровы и 17 овец, продажа молока и молочных продуктов составляет 17,000 сом в месяц. Также, Чачыкан возделывает 0,94 га собственной и 3,0 га арендованной земли, где она выращивает арбузы и хлопок.   
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чачыкан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку мелкого скота и минеральных удобрений.  Доходы от кредита Чачыкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Chachykan is 47 years old, married, and has four children. Chachykan has been engaged in animal husbandry for a period of 20 years, after having started this business virtually from scratch. Thanks to persistent work, Chachykan currently has two dairy cows and 17 sheep at her farm, and the sale of milk and dairy products amounts to 17,000 som (KGS) per month. Chachykan further cultivates 0.94 hectares of her own and 3.0 hectares of rented land, where she grows melon and cotton. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Chachykan turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of sheep and goats and mineral fertilizers. Chachykan plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of animals.

loans.use: to purchase small livestock and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Lealao

texts.en: Lealao is 52 years old and a widow with eight children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for three years. Lealao has requested a loan to improve her business and buy flour, sugar and other pancake flavorings. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Lealao will help her kids improve their home.

loans.use: To buy flour and other ingredients for pancakes.

loans.name: Hugo Armando

texts.es:
Hugo es un joven de 20 años el cual es muy trabajador y entusiasta, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por ser la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, asimismo se le conoce porque sus pobladores tienen una buena sazon para la preparacion de platillos. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear ya que lo relaja mucho y se distrae del mal humor, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Ceviche”. El con esfuerzo logro estudiar la carrera técnica de Computación e informática.

Con entusiasmo Hugo trabaja día a día en su negocio de imprenta y fotocopiado, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 10 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy dedicado y sobre todo tiene una atención amable hacia los clientes.

Hugo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar los trámites para obtener su titulo, con esta mejora el podrá tener su titulo y con el podrá conseguir empleo, así el seguirá luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una escuela de computación”.
texts.en:
Hugo, 20, is a hardworking, enthusiastic young man.  His house is located in the city of Chincha, a city noted for being the birthplace of great Peruvian sports heroes as well as for the tasty way its residents cook food.  When he has free time available, he likes to go out strolling because it relaxes him very much and takes away his bad mood.  He also enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes, the very delicious “Ceviche” [marinated seafood].  With much effort he was able to study the technical career of Computer Sciences.

Hugo works every day with enthusiasm in his printing and photocopying business; he spends about 8 hours daily and can see up to ten customers per day.  He believes that he does well in business because he’s very dedicated and above all provides kind customer service.

Hugo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to pay the fees to obtain his professional degree.  With this improvement, he will have his professional title and with it will be able to secure employment to continue striving daily to attain his greatest dream:  to have a computer sciences school.

loans.use: to pay for his professional degree certification.

loans.name: Foafoainuuese

texts.en:
Foafoainuuese is a 55-year-old married woman with one child.
 
She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Foafoainuuese has requested a loan to purchase farm supplies such as tools and chemicals.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Foafoainuuese hopes to improve her business and home.

loans.use: to buy farming tools and chemicals

loans.name: Salafai

texts.en: Salafai is 41 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling fruits and vegetables in her community and has been doing this for two years. Salafai has requested a loan to buy vegetable gardening tools. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Salafai will expand her business.

loans.use: to buy garden tools

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en: Rachael is 19 years old and single. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. Rachael has requested a loan to buy more flavors for her pancakes. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Rachael will look for a good location for her business and improve her home.

loans.use: to buy more supplies for making pancakes

loans.name: Falefou

texts.en:
Falefou is a 25-year-old single woman. She has a small plantation and grows banana and taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years.

Falefou has requested a loan to buy new farming resources.
 
This is her third loan with SPBD. With her profits, Falefou hopes to look for another business.

loans.use: to buy farming tools and chemicals

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 54 años, está casada con Feliciano, el padre de sus 9 hijos, pero ahora sólo viven con 4 de ellos. Su casa es propia y está ubicada en el caserío de Bellavista –Tarma.

Criar 9 hijos no es una tarea fácil, la mayoría de ellos estudian en escuelas superiores en la ciudad de Lima, por eso envía cada mes una cantidad de dinero para ellos. Y gracias a sus diferentes actividades puede obtener el capital suficiente para también invertir en sus cultivos y en su negocio.  Carmen tiene una tienda de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad, los que ofrece a los pobladores de su localidad.  Asimismo se dedica a la siembra de papa, arvejas, maíz y hortalizas, en sus terrenos propios, ubicados a media hora de su vivienda. 
Lleva cerca de 20 años en esta actividad y considera que tiene éxito vendiendo a los comerciantes mayoristas del mercado. Asimismo, se dedica a la crianza de animales como: carneros, vacas y toros, los que vende para obtener dinero extra. Del ganado vacuno es del que saca más provecho, ya que los emplea como instrumentos para arar sus terrenos. 
Sus objetivos se centran en la educación de sus hijos, por eso trabajará duro para seguir ayudándolos en lo que pueda.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay” y éste sería su crédito número 7 con MFP. Está muy agradecida con el apoyo brindado hasta el momento, por eso se compromete en ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Carmen invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de tres terneras, cuyos precios varían entre 400 y 500 soles, las que piensa engordar para luego vender.
texts.en:
Carmen, 54, is married to Feliciano, the father of her nine children; only four of them still live with them.  Her house is hers and it’s located in the Bellavista settlement in Tarma.

Raising nine children is no easy task.  Most of them attend higher level schools in the city of Lima so every month she sends a certain amount of money for them.  Thanks to her various activities she’s able to get sufficient capital to also invest in her crops and in her business.

Carmen has a store selling groceries and basic staple items to local residents.  She also grows potatoes, peas, corn and vegetables on her own land located half an hour from her house.

She’s been in this activity nearly 20 years and feels that she’s successful selling to wholesale merchants in the market.  She also raises livestock like calves, cows and bulls that she sells to obtain extra money.  She gets the most use from her cattle because she uses them as tools to plow the land.

Her objectives are centered on her children’s education and she will work hard to continue helping them with whatever she can.

She belongs to the “Señor de Muruhuay” communal bank and this would be her loan #7 with MFP.  She’s very grateful for the support provided to date and this is why she commits to be punctual with her installment payments.

Carmen will use the money she’s requesting to buy three calves whose price varies between 400 and 500 soles that she plans to fatten up for subsequent sale.

loans.use: to buy three calves.

loans.name: Lealoaina

texts.en: Lealoaina is 22 years old and single. She runs a small business selling vegetables in her community and has been doing this for one year. Lealoaina has requested a loan to buy tools and fertilizer. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Lealoaina will expand the business.

loans.use: to buy garden tools

loans.name: Souleymane

texts.fr:
Né le 02 Août 1984, ce jeune menuisier est très ambitieux, ayant à son actif plus d’une dizaine années d’expérience. 
Il a dans son atelier sis dans son quartier,  quatre apprentis qui l’aident dans ses tâches. Sa clientèle est au-delà de sa région car bénéficiant régulièrement de commandes en provenance des autres régions. Il  compte renouveler certains de ses outils de travail et à l’occasion acheter du bois en quantité pour faire face à ses commandes.
 Avec le partenariat qu’il mène avec notre institution il compte dans le futur rendre son activité plus professionnelle avec plus de visibilité. De même être en mesure d’aider sa mère dans les charges familiales.
texts.en:
This is a very ambitious young carpenter, born August 2, 1984, who has more than ten years of experience in his field.  His workshop is located in his neighborhood and four apprentices help him with his tasks. 

His customer base extends to other regions as he regularly receives orders from other geographic areas.  He is planning to upgrade some of his tools and, additionally, to buy enough wood to meet his orders.

Through partnership with our institution, his future plan is to make his business more professional and to have better visibility.  He would also like to be able to help his mother with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy wood to make and sell furniture.

loans.name: Monique

texts.en: Monique is 35 years old and married with three children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy materials to improve her business. In the future, Monique hopes to save her profits to help her business and her kids' education. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: To buy more supplies for making pancakes

loans.name: Alatauai

texts.en: Alatauai is a 19-year-old woman who is single. She plans to start a small lawn mowing business.  Alatauai needs a loan to purchase new lawn mowing equipment. She will use her profits to expand her business and help her kids' education. Alatauai joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: To purchase equipment for lawn mowing

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
15 mujeres se unieron y de esa unión surge el comité llamado mujeres valientes. Ellas son personas con muchas ganas de ayudar a sus familias, tienen un gran espíritu emprendedor y por sobre todo muchas ganas de trabajar y ayudarse a cumplir sus metas.
Claudelina es una de estas mujeres emprendedoras, comenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, gracias a lo cual ha podido ayudar a su familia, y darles lo que necesitan para el día a día. Es una persona muy entusiasta y con deseos de superación.
Su meta es seguir ayudando y trabajando y es con ganas de seguir esta meta que solicita el crédito, ya que desea comprar prendas de invierno, ya que se acerca la temporada de frio y quiere tener una buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Fifteen women came together to form this union and the committee is called Courageous Women. They are people eager to support their families. They have a great entrepreneurial spirit and above all they are eager to work to help themselves accomplish their goals.

Claudelina is one of these women entrepreneurs. She comments that she works selling all types of clothing, thanks to which she has been able to help her family and support their daily needs. She is a enthusiastic person with the desire to triumph.

Her goal is to continue helping and working and she is eager to continue this goal by asking for a loan, as she wants to buy winter cloths, as the cold season is approaching and she wants to have a good variety to offer her clients.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Nurjamal

texts.ru:
Нуржамал 40 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Нуржамал на протяжении 8 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 12,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Нуржамал в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова, 1 лошадь, доход от продажи молока составляет 4,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуржамал обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку овец и бычка.  Доходы от кредита Нуржамал планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Nurjamal is forty years old, married and she has four children. With a starting capital of 12,000 soms, Nurjamal began an animal breeding business eight years ago. Thanks to her hard work, she now owns one milking cow, one horse, and a monthly income of 4,000 soms generated from the sale of milk. With the hope of expanding her business further, Nurjamal approached "Bai Tushum and Partners" with a request for 100,000 soms (KGS) in order to purchase a bull and some sheep. 
She plans to invest profits from the loan back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Vitoria

texts.en: Vitoria is a 51-year-old married woman with three children. She makes and sells scones/doughnuts in her community to earn a living. She has one year of experience with this business. Vitoria needs a loan to buy more supplies and equipment for baking. She plans to use her profits to improve her business. Vitoria has been a member of SPBD since 2010.

loans.use: To purchase additional equipment for baking

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila tiene 28 años, está casada con Erminio, con quien tiene 2 hijos; Braham y Verenise. Viven en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Bellavista Huaracayo- Tarma.  

Su principal actividad es la agricultura, ya lleva cerca de 10 años en la siembra de arvejas, habas, papa, maíz y hortalizas. “Mis terrenos están lejos, me demoro como media hora para llegar”, menciona. A pesar de eso, Luzmila, con la constancia que la caracteriza, todas las mañanas sube muy contenta a cuidar de sus cultivos, con la ayuda de su esposo y de peones que le ayudan en tiempos de cosecha. Cuando esto sucede, traslada sus productos hacia el mercado mayorista para negociarlos.
Ahora se está preparando para la siembra de arvejas, está segura que logrará buenos resultados, ya que estos meses son de campañas grandes y sus ventas se dan al por mayor, con compradores que llegan de la ciudad de Lima.

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Muruhuay”, y éste es su crédito número 5 con MFP. Se siente identificada con su grupo, a tal punto que es la tesorera, por esa razón se compromete en ser puntual en los pagos de sus cuotas. Ella siempre recurre a su banco comunal para solventar sus principales necesidades.
Luzmila invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 4 bolsas de semillas de arvejas, lo que suma 2200 soles. Lo restante lo empleará para comprar fertilizantes.
texts.en:
28-year old Luzmila is married to Erminio and they have two children, Braham and Verenise. They live in their own house located in the village of Bellavista Huaracayo, Tarma.

Luzmila’s principal source of income is agriculture. She’s been growing peas, beans, potatoes, maize and vegetables for about ten years. “My fields are far away; it takes me half an hour to get there,” she says. However, with the determination that characterizes her, Luzmila leaves the house every morning quite contentedly to tend her land. Her husband and some labourers help her at harvest time. When this takes place, she transports the produce to the wholesale market to sell.

Now she is preparing to sow peas. She is sure that the harvest will be profitable as it is a good time of year to sell the crops to buyers from Lima. 

Luzmila belongs to the Señor de Muruhuay Community Bank, and this is her fifth loan with MFP. She is a significant part of the group as she is treasurer, and for this reason she promises to be punctual with the repayments. She always turns to the bank for funds for important needs.  She plans to use the money to buy four bags of pea seeds which comes to 2200 soles. The rest of the money will be used to buy fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Puaula

texts.en: Puaula is a 27 year-old woman who is married with five children. She plans to start a small business car washing.  Puaula needs a loan to buy more materials for business improvements. She will use her profits to help the business and attend to family matters. Puaula joined Kiva partner SPBD in 2009 in order to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her car wash business.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.en:
Felipa is from Sto. Niño,Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 60 years old. Felipa is widowed and has one child. To make a living, Felipa plants, harvests, and sells rice. She has been in her business for seven years and earns PHP 4,000 a month for these activities.

In 2008, Felipa joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Heidy Claribel

texts.es:
La señora esta separa de su esposo, tiene 24 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos 2  de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la venta de comida y refacciones, inicio este negocio por iniciativa propia, lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de verduras, frutas, leche, carnes, condimentos alimenticios, etc. Espera que su negocio en el futuro se grande.
texts.en:
This lady is separated from her husband, and is 24 years old. She did not have the opportunity to attend school. She has three children, two of which are students. She works selling food and spare parts. She began this business on her own initiative and has two years experience.

She is asking for a loan to be used to buy vegetables, fruit, milk, meat, food condiments, etc. She is hoping that her business will grow larger.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business

loans.name: Torype Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
“Torype Oñondivepa” están  en el Décimo Sexto, y todo esto gracias al trabajo que todas ellas hacen juntas. Son mujeres con muchas ganas de salir adelante, ayudarse y trabajar todas juntas. El grupo tiene 18 integrantes, donde todas ellas trabajan siempre en un ambiente de cooperación y se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Maximina se define a su misma como una buena microempresaria, ella se dedica al comercio desde hace un tiempo, y es gracias a su pequeña despensa que puede ayudar a su familia y darles lo que necesitan para una vida digna y decorosa. Su meta es poder agrandar su local y alguna vez tener un gran negocio.
Ella pide el crédito a la fundación y a Kiva para la compra de bebidas, lácteos, fideos, arroz, yerba y demás insumos, con los cuales podrá darle a sus clientes una buena variedad.
texts.en:
“Torype Oñondivepa” is in the 16th loan cycle which is thanks to all the work that they do together. They are women who are eager to get ahead, helping themselves and working together. The group has 18 members, all of them always work together in an atmosphere of cooperation and they help one another.

Maximina describes herself as a good entrepreneur. She has been working in trade for some time, and it is thanks to her little store that she can help her family and give them everything they need in order to have a decent and proper life. Her goal is to be able to expand her facility and one day to have a bigger business. 

She is asking for a loan from the foundation and Kiva in order to buy drinks, milk, noodles, rice, yerba (mate) and other supplies with which she will be able to offer her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to buy drinks, milk, noodles, rice, yerba (mate) and other supplies

loans.name: Victor Hugo

texts.es: Víctor es un joven soltero de 18 años. Vive en Portoviejo con sus padres. Víctor nos cuenta que desde los 14 años le ha gustado trabajar, empezó ayudando en el negocio de su tía ya que tenía muchos gastos y no tenia como solventarlos. Ahora que ya es mayor de edad emprendió la venta de granos al por menor de manera independiente, lo realiza solo recorriendo varios sectores de lunes a sábado sin horario establecido. La dificultas que se le presenta en la actualidad es que sus clientes se queden sin trabajo y no le puedan cancelar la mercadería. Con el préstamo comprara mas arroz para la venta con esto incrementar su negocio. Su sueño aunque ambicioso es agrandar su negocio de tal manera que pueda generar fuente de trabajo en su ciudad. Víctor eres un joven emprendedor esperamos que tus sueños se cumplan, suerte.
texts.en:
Victor is a single young man who is 18 years of age. He lives in Portoviejo with his parents. Victor says that he has enjoyed working ever since he was 14. He began helping out at his aunt's business because he had many expenses but no way to pay for them. Now that he is an adult, he started an independent business selling grains at retail. He travels by himself to different neighborhoods Monday through Saturday without a set schedule. His current difficulties include dealing with his customers who are unemployed and not able to pay for their merchandise.

With this loan, Victor will buy more rice to sell so that he can increase his business. His dream, although ambitious, is to expand his business to the point that he can create jobs in his city. Victor is a young entrepreneur who hopes to fulfill his dreams. He deserves the best of luck.

loans.use: to buy rice.

loans.name: Chonimacorral Group

texts.es:
La señora Paulina Susana. esta casada, tiene 29 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijos, se dedica a la crianza de animales, inicio este negocio grado gallina y hasta el momento lleva 7 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la confección de prendas.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de cerdos y poder aumentar su negocio, ya que espera en el futuro contar con una granja. Las demás integrantes de grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales, venta de productos de consumo diario.
texts.en:
Paulina Susana is 29 years old, married with one child, and completed five years of primary school.  She makes a living raising animals.  She started off raising chickens and now has 7 years of experience.  She has the support of her husband, who makes garments.

She organizes a group to request a loan, which she will use to purchase hogs and improve her business.  In the future she hopes to have a farm.  The other members of the group make their livings in animal husbandry and the sale of everyday goods.

loans.use: to purchase hogs

loans.name: Taitasi

texts.en:
Taitasi is a 45-year-old married woman with five children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience with this business. 

Taitasi needs a loan to purchase more resources for making pancakes. She plans to use her profits to expand her business and help pay for her kids' education. 

Taitasi has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to purchase additional supplies for making pancakes.

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en:
Virgie is married with three children to care for. She is 40 years old and lives in Curvada, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

To earn a living, Virgie sells personal products such as fashion dresses, comforters and more. She has been operating this business for four years and earns 7000 PHP each month. 

She has requested a loan of 10000 PHP from GDMPC to obtain more personal products to sell. Virgie has been a member of the cooperative for two years. 

In the future, Virgie hopes to be more progressive in this venture and would like to expand her facility and product offerings to attract more customers. She plans to procure trendy items to meet the market's current demands.

loans.use: to obtain more personal products to sell.

loans.name: Gustav

texts.en:
Gustav is 28 years old and married with one child. She runs a small business selling snacks, curry, rice, soft drinks and more in her community; she has been doing this for two years. 

Gustav joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. She has requested a loan to purchase more goods for her canteen and food stall. Gustav will use her earnings for home improvement expenses and to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase goods for her food stall.

loans.name: Sara Amparo

texts.es:
La señora sara amparo vive en la ciudad de Managua , trabaja como comerciante en un mercado de Managua la actividad de su negocio es venta de verdura ,
Con el préstamo que obtuvo la señora va a comprar ayote, tamarindo, quequisque  para incrementar su inventario y hacer mantener su clientela.
Doña Sara  manifiesta que con los prestamos que ceprodel le da, ha aumentado su capital de trabajo , y por ende sus ganancia
texts.en:
Sra. Sara Amparo lives in the city of Managua. She works as a merchant at a market in Managua. Her business involves selling vegetables.

With this loan, Sra. Sara will buy squash, tamarind, and taro in order to increase her inventory and maintain her customer base. Doña Sara says that the loans given to her by CEPRODEL have increased her operating capital, as well as her earnings.

loans.use: to buy taro, tamarind, and squash.

loans.name: Jose Inocente

texts.es:
El señor Jose Inocente esta casado, tiene 24 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos que aun no estudian, se dedica a la sastrería y al comercio de calzados de plásticos, inicio este negocio de venta de calzado por iniciativa propia y lleva 6 meses de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo e su esposa. 

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para compra de una maquina para costura y poder compra mercadería de calzados de plástico y mejorar su ganancias, espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose is 24 years old, married, and has a sixth grade education. He has two children who are not in school. Jose works as a tailor and also sells plastic shoes. He started his business of selling shoes through his own initiative and now has six months of experience. Jose has the support of his wife.

He is requesting a loan to use for purchasing a sewing machine and an inventory of plastic shoes so that he can improve his earnings. In the future, Jose hopes to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy plastic shoes and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Martha Elizabeth

texts.es: Martha es una joven madre de familia que vive en el Suburbio de Guayaquil, área suburbana de la ciudad donde tiene su casa propia. A sus 27 años tiene varias actividades que le generan ingresos para su hogar. Martha nos cuenta que hace un año empezó la venta de productos por catálogos y zapatos ya que también labora como estilista en un gabinete de belleza. El trabajo lo realiza sola de lunes a domingo preferentemente en la mañana ya que en las tardes se encuentra en el gabinete. Su mayor preocupación es que al movilizarse le roben la mercadería o el dinero que haya recaudado por el cobro a sus cliente. En soltera pero tiene dos niños que asisten a la escuela particular, no le gusta la publica aunque no tendría costo porque le queda lejos de su domicilio. Con el crédito comprara productos como maquillaje, cremas, perfumes y zapatos. Su meta a futuro es terminar la construcción de su casa y abrir una peluquería unisex con lo cual pasaría más tiempo con sus hijos.
texts.en: Martha, 27, is a young mother who lives in her own house in a suburban area of Guayaquil.  She has various businesses that generate income for her household.  Martha tells us that a year ago she began to sell products from catalogs and shoes and she also works as a hair stylist in a beauty shop.  She sells only Mondays through Sundays, preferably in the mornings, since she works in the beauty shop in the afternoon.  Her biggest worry is that when she moves around to sell, she will be robbed of her merchandise or the money that she has collected from her customers.  She is a single mother with two children who go to a private school.  She doesn’t like the public school although it’s free because it’s very far from her house.  She will use the loan to buy makeup, creams, perfumes and shoes.  Her goal in the future is to finish building her house and to open a unisex beauty salon so she can spend more time with her children.

loans.use: to buy makeup, creams, perfumes and shoes

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en: Luzviminda is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 52 years old, married and has one child. Luzviminda used her last loan to purchase additional products to sell. Her business is successful, and she's taking a new loan to buy more personal products such as shoes, sandals and more. In the future she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy more personal products such as shoes, sandals and more

loans.name: Emmy

texts.en:
Emmy is a 45-year-old married woman with 3 children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas and vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. Emmy has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer, rakes, shovels, weed spray, chemicals, etc. 

This is her 2nd loan with SPBD. With her profits, Emmy hopes to expand her plantation with a vegetable garden and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies for growing taro and bananas

loans.name: Sonya

texts.en: Sonya is a 33-year-old woman who is married with 4 children. She runs a business selling groceries like chicken, sugar, rice, noodles, and cigarettes in her community. She has 1 year of experience with this business. Sonya has requested a loan to buy more goods. She plans to use her profits to expand the business. She became a member of SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her store

loans.name: Battulga

texts.en:
Borrower Battulga is a 44-year-old widow who lives with her two children in an outer ger district, which lacks the basic infrastructure of the Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. Her children are attending university and high school, while she supports her family by operating a clothing stall business at a local indoor market. Battulga has operated this business since 2008. 

She usually sells womanswear, especially high heels, a variety of blouses, skinny trousers for young girls etc. which she imports from Beijing once every 2 months. 

The end of spring/beginning of summer is graduation season in Mongolia, so Battulga wants to increase her working capital and attract more customers during this period. She is requesting a 2.500.000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase a variety of clothes to sell during the graduation season.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell during the graduation season

loans.name: Maria Martha

texts.es:
María de 61 años de edad, casada, originaria de Estelí, madre de 7 hijos todos mayores de edad viven independiente. Ella es comerciante desde hace  30 años en el negocio de pulpería, anteriormente  obtuvo un crédito por nuestra institución que fue de mucha ayuda ya que lo utilizo para invertir en su negocio en la compra de granos básicos tales como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón, etc.  Actualmente esta solicitando el préstamo al igual para invertir en el negocio esta vez en la compra de pollo, huevo, azúcar, frijoles, etc. 
Sus metas son mantener su negocio estable con todo lo que demanda la clientela surtirlo con los productos que son de mayor necesidad en una pulpería al igual espera  seguir trabajando con créditos y el apoyo de nuestra institución con el objetivo de  invertir más en la pulpería para generar más ingresos y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
María is 61 years old, married, comes from Estelí, and is the mother of seven children, who are all of age and live independently.  She has been a businesswoman for the past 30 years, working in a small restaurant.  Previously she obtained a loan through our lending institution, which was a great help to her, since she was able to invest the money in her business by buying basic items like rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, etc.  Currently, she is asking for a similar loan to invest in her business, this time to buy chicken, eggs, sugar, beans, etc.

Her goals are to maintain a stable business by meeting her customers' needs with the products that are most needed in a small restaurant, so she hopes to continue working through loans and the help of our institution with the goal of investing more in her restaurant to generate greater profits and get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken, eggs, sugar, and beans.

loans.name: Norelyn

texts.en: Norelyn is a 23-year-old single mom of an only child. She is living in Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines, where her wide garden production is located. She has been cultivating this land since she was 21 years of age until the present time. She doesn't mind the scratches and itches brought by this kind of plant, for as long as she can earn income, Norelyn goes for it. She normally receives 8,000 PHP a month. Earlier this year, Norelyn joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next planting. When the crop gets realized, the revenue from it will be allotted to expanding the business area to earn more income and to sustain her daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next planting

loans.name: Laura

texts.en:
Laura is from Curvada, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 66 years old, married, with 4 children. Laura owns and operates a sari-sari store where she sells products such as shampoo, soap, toothpaste etc., in the local community. Laura has been in her business for 15 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month.

In 2009, Laura joined Kiva partner, GDMPC. Laura is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering

loans.name: Kalameli

texts.en:
Kalameli is 28 years old and single with no children. 

She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, etc. that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for the last year. Kalameli needs a loan to expand the business by purchasing additional farm supplies.

She became a member of SPBD in 2012. Kalameli will use the profits from her sales to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals and more taro crops, etc.

loans.name: Siniva

texts.en: Siniva is a 61-year-old married woman with 1 child. She makes and sells round donuts, long donuts and meat pies in her community to earn a living. She has 5 years of experience with this business. Siniva needs a loan to buy more ingredients for her business. She plans to use her profits to build up her own food stall. Siniva has been a member of SPBD since 2008.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and yeast for baking.

loans.name: María Félix

texts.es:
La señora María Félix   vive en la ciudad de Managua trabaja como comerciante en un mercado de la capital 
Es una persona responsable con grandes deseo de superación tanto en su trabajo como en su vida personal
La señora  María solicito el crédito en  nuestra institución para seguir creciendo en su negocio, con el dinero que presto va hacer la compra de maya de chiltona, para incrementar su negocio y así
 obtener mayor ganancia en  negocio Las mejoras que la señora va a realizar es la tapia en la parte trasera de su vivienda.
texts.en:
María Félix lives in the city of Managua, where she works as a salesperson in the marketplace of the capital.  She is a responsible person with great dreams of success in her work as well as in her personal life.

María asked for this loan at our institution to continue growing her business.  With the money she is loaned she plans to buy sweet peppers to grow her business and make better profits at her work.  The improvements that this lady will make are to fence in the back part of her property.

loans.use: to buy sweet peppers.

loans.name: Cayetano

texts.es: Don Cayetano de 75 años, es el propietario de una carpintería ubicada en la ciudad de Cartagena donde vive con su esposa y tiene 7 hijos en las edades de 25 a 51 años. Desde sus 14 años aprendió su oficio, con un carpintero a quien ayudara en ese momento. De allí tomó toda su experiencia y siempre trabajaba soñando con su propio taller, hasta que en el año 1989 lo logró. Desde ese momento se dedicó a fabricar y vender muebles y también es contratado por empresas simultáneamente, porque conocen la calidad con la que trabaja.   Su meta es ampliar sus servicios de carpintería a productos de  metalmecánica, teniendo un taller más grande. En la actualidad está planeando su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará materiales e insumos para elaborar muebles y también hará pequeñas adecuaciones locativas. Su credikiva tendrá éxito porque está fundamentado en pedidos que han hecho sus clientes y además por su experiencia en el manejo de su negocio, que le ha generado una acreditada clientela.
texts.en: Cayetano is 75 years old. He is the owner of a carpentry shop located in the city of Cartagena, where he lives with his wife and seven children who are between the ages of 25 and 51. He began learning his trade when he was 14 years old, from a carpenter who he helped at that time. From there, he took all of his experience, dreamed of having his own workshop, and kept working until he achieved that in 1989. From that moment on he dedicated himself to making and selling furniture. He is simultaneously employed by companies because they know the quality of his work. Cayetano's goal is to expand his carpentry service to include metal working, and to have a larger workshop. He is currently planning on his first "credikiva," which will be the first financing that he has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy materials and supplies for furniture-making and he will also make some small adjustments to his workspace. This loan will be successful because it is based on orders that his customers have already made, and furthermore because Cayetano has generated a good client base thanks to his experience managing the business.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies for making furniture

loans.name: Kerly Maria

texts.es: Kerly tiene 32 años, es madre soltera y vive en Duran. Es panificadora, empezó su negocio ya que sus hijos fueron creciendo con esto también lo hacían sus gastos, por esto se vio en la necesidad de iniciar su propio negocio. Kerly nos cuenta que su decisión fue acertada ya que le va bien, dedica gran parte del día a la elaboración de galletas y chavelitas contando con la ayuda de su hija mayor quien contribuye al salir de sus clases. El mayor riesgo que le presenta el negocio es al momento de la entrega  ya que lo realiza en sectores apartados de la ciudad lo cual aumento el riesgo de la delincuencia. Como es madre soltera se siente satisfecha de salir adelante con su familia sin mayores dificultades. Tiene 3 hijos los cuales tiene 18, 5 y 2 años de edad quienes estudian en la escuela y colegio fiscal. El préstamo lo va a utilizar en la compra de harina, manteca, azúcar para la elaboración de sus dulces. Le gustaría en próximos años dar a conocer sus productos con lo que tendría más clientes y mejorar su economía en beneficio de sus hijos.
texts.en: Kerly is 32 years old. She is a single mother and lives in Duran. She is a bread baker and started her business because her chidlren were growing and so were her expenses. Kerly tells us that her decision was confirmed because it is going well for her. She spends a big part of her day making cookies and chavelitas  Her oldest daughter helps when she gets out of school. The biggest risk in the business is that when she makes her deliveries she does them in places away from the city which elevates the risk of crime. Since she is a single mother, she feels satisfied getting ahead with her family without big difficulties. She has 3 children, aged 18, 5 and 2. They go to primary school and high school. She will use the loan to buy flour, lard, and sugar to make her sweets. fiscal. In the next few years she would like to have more customers and improve her finances for her children.

loans.use: to buy flour, lard and sugar.

loans.name: Adelaida Del Carme

texts.es:
La señora Adelaida  del Carmen    tiene su negocio en  un mercado de  Managua  venta de queso, pero además de comercializarlo también lo procesa  tiene las maquinas para la elaboración de ellos  es por eso que su crédito lo utiliza para  la compra de leche de vaca para realizar el queso ,crema ,queso quesillo, 
La señora vende al por mayor a los pequeños comerciante del mercado, doña Adelaida  manifiesta que con los prestamos de ceprodel ha podido mantener sus productos  y así ofertar   productos  a su clientela
texts.en:
Adelaida del Carme has a business in a market in Managua where she sells cheese. She also has machinery that allows her to make cheeses, and she is requesting this loan in order to purchase milk to use in the cheese making process. She makes cheese, cream, cheesecake, etc, and sells her products in bulk to the smaller vendors in the market. 

Adelaida is grateful for the loans she has received through Ceprodel, as they have helped her to keep up her business and production, and they allow her to offer high quality products to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase milk in bulk.

loans.name: Vitelia

texts.es: Vitelia con su anterior credikiva compró materiales y elaboró las mas hermosas hamacas y mochilas y las vendió muy pronto. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva con el cual planea comprar hilo fino por pacas, forros y acondicionará un poco el local, porque tiene muchos encargos y va a responder a ellos para ganar un poco mas de dinero y podrá ofrecer unas instalaciones atractivas a sus clientes actuales y potenciales.
